message_1: If the plain text "MATH" is encrypted using a rail fence cipher with two rails, what is the corresponding cipher text?
message_2:
A rail fence cipher with two rails arranges the letters in a zigzag pattern, and the cipher text is read from left to right, top to bottom. For the plain text "MATH":

M A
 T H

The corresponding cipher text is "MATH" since the letters remain in the same order when read from left to right, top to bottom.
